titles.title: To establish the Adams Memorial Commission to carry out the provisions of Public Law 107-62, and for other purposes.
To establish the Adams Memorial Commission to carry out the provisions of Public Law 107-62, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This bill establishes the Adams Memorial Commission to replace the Adams Memorial Foundation in planning a permanent memorial in the District of Columbia to honor John Adams and his legacy. The commission terminates after seven years.
